metadata.title: CVE-2019-12881 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
i915_gem_userptr_get_pages in drivers/gpu/drm/i915/i915_gem_userptr.c inthe Linux kernel 4.15.0 on Ubuntu 18.04.2 allows local users to cause adenial of service (NULL pointer dereference and BUG) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via crafted ioctl calls to /dev/dri/card0.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12881` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-138-generic - 4.4.0-138.164
